amendment.description: Amendment extends until October 1, 2000, a current moratorium on a Federal takeover of Alaska's fish and game resources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 105-637 to extend until October 1, 2000, a current moratorium on the Federal takeover of fisheries management of certain navigable waters owned by the State of Alaska.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
